name: Rock paper and scissors
description: The classic rock paper and scissors game made with pure HTML CSS and JS

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: Old but gold. The famous tic tac toe game made with React

name: Weather in Cluj-Napoca
description: A Wheather page dedicated to Cluj-Napoca, using a real API and AJAX to fetch the info, storing locally and in Cookies the preferences. It shows real-time wheather

name: Comment list page
description: A comment list page, using AJAX fetch with HTTP requests to GET and POST

name: Drum Kit
description: Drum Kit made using keycode and DOM Manipulation with Vanilla JavaScript to interact with it using the keyboard!

name: JSClock
description: Real-time vintage clock. Using Vanilla JavaScript

name: Employee List
description: Employee list app fetching online API using Async JS to GET and POST HTML requests

name: Guest House
description: A guest house website designed and realized using illustrator, HTML, CSS and the famous WordPress CMS. An elegant and attractive style that digitalize the guest house's atmosphere.

name: Training and Team Building
description: An ex soldier contacted me with an amazing idea. Realizing something unique that could represent his ideas wasn't easy, but for sure challenging and satisfactory.

name: Mentoring Association
description: An out-of-the-box design for a mentoring association. Something new and fascinating for the children. Using Illustrator, HTML, CSS and the famous WordPress CMS.
